speed_limits.notes: Safe Speed 5030 policy: 50 km/h on main roads, 30 km/h in school zones/residential areas.

alcohol_limit.notes: Strict penalties. 0.03% to 0.08% results in license suspension.

rules.headlights_rules: Must be on in tunnels and at night.
rules.priority_rules: Vehicles inside the roundabout have priority.

tolls.notes: Hi-Pass (electronic) lanes are blue. Cash lanes are common.

rules.parking_rules: Strictly enforced. Look for designated parking lots.

summary: South Korea has modern infrastructure but high traffic density. A unique rule is that motorcycles are mostly banned from highways. Left turns allowed only on green arrow signals.
common_traps: Unprotected left turns are rare; look for arrows.
Speed cameras are everywhere (and navigation apps warn you).
rental_and_idp_notes: IDP is required. Credit card usually needed.
